select KEYWORD_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL AS KEY FROM DUAL
insert into KEYWORDS (KEYID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, OPTIMISTICLOCKINGVERSION) values (#key#, #name#, #description#, #optimisticLockingVersion#)
sqlMap.update: update KEYWORDS set NAME=#name#, DESCRIPTION=#description#, OPTIMISTICLOCKINGVERSION=OPTIMISTICLOCKINGVERSION+1 where KEYID=#key# AND OPTIMISTICLOCKINGVERSION=#optimisticLockingVersion#
